CustomField.description: **System Calculated** A link to the related donor's record as determined by the value of the "Entity" field.
CustomField.formula: IF(ISPICKVAL(DonorApi__Entity__c,"Account"),HYPERLINK("/" & DonorApi__Account__r.Id, DonorApi__Account__r.Name), HYPERLINK("/" & DonorApi__Contact__r.Id, DonorApi__Contact__r.FirstName & " " & DonorApi__Contact__r.LastName))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: **System Calculated** A link to the related donor's record as determined by the value of the "Entity" field.
CustomField.label: Donor
